title: Attribution Window
description: Describes the attribution methodology and lookback windows used for conversion measurement. Enables cross-platform comparison by making attribution methodology transparent.

post_click.description: Post-click attribution window. Conversions occurring within this duration after a click are attributed to the ad.

post_view.description: Post-view attribution window. Conversions occurring within this duration after an ad impression (without click) are attributed to the ad.

model.description: Attribution model used to assign credit when multiple touchpoints exist
